page.title: 13A Survey of peoples life
page.content: Here are the results of questionaire sent to a number of adults. Most families had 2 adults and 2 children. Most families had a pet. A majority of homes had the following: T.V. a Car, Telephone, Fridge, Central heating, a Cooker and a Freezer.A quarter owned a Video, a Computer, a Microwave cooker. Most homes had a garage and a garden. Half the families surveyed had holidays abroad and had a hobby. The majority of people were satisfied with the shops in the area and with the library and recreation facilities. For leisure people were involved in many clubs and voluntary organisations one of the most unusual was Bell Ringing.A number of adults enjoyed the Theatre and supported local Amature groups and the professionals in Manchester.
